name: audio
docstring:
Using react-player and not implement all props and callback yet.
    reference: https://github.com/cookpete/react-player.

properties.name: url
properties.description: The url of a video or song to play

properties.name: playing
properties.description: Set to true or false to pause or play the media

properties.name: loop
properties.description: Set to true or false to loop the media

properties.name: controls
properties.description: Set to true or false to display native player controls.

properties.name: light
properties.description: Set to true to show just the video thumbnail, which loads the full player on click

properties.name: volume
properties.description: Set the volume of the player, between 0 and 1

properties.name: width
properties.description: Set the width of the player: ex:640px

properties.name: height
properties.description: Set the height of the player: ex:640px
